documents.document: Now that Tohu Harris is ditching us for over the ditch at season's end, we better take out the title #purplepride
More importantly, I miss Cheez TV. https://t.co/Kgn9DocgDv
Awwww Rod Laver is wearing joggers with his suit. Grandpas take note #AusOpen

Is it just me or is Rafa not very happy about the whole thing?
Either that or he needs to go to the bathroom #AusOpen
Plus side is now I can go to bed. Downside is that I have to be up in six hours.
No sleep til Federer wins the damn thing and another cow #AusOpen
....and back to deuce #AusOpen
@pjhelliar What about in Slazenger?
So guess who has put the telly back on. Who needs sleep when you have sports! #AusOpen
I can't handle this anymore, my bed needs me. Sleep needs me. Oh sleep #AusOpen #FedererNadal
Me tomorrow after tonight's game #AusOpen https://t.co/e78Yo1iTuR
Thanks Roger for taking my sleep schedule into account #AusOpen
@teliferous Not sure about the second cow Roger was given but the first one was cared for by someone else.
Dammit Roger. I have to be up at 4.30 QLD time tomorrow. Hurry up and win #AusOpen
@teliferous I know Federer was also given a bell for his first cow after winning a tournament.
Also how could you not go for someone who has been given two cows? #AusOpen
I'm going for Federer because he's from the land of chocolate #AusOpen
Wait...Fui Fui Moi Moi is still a thing?

Now what do I watch on telly for 11 months???
Time to rehash my Neighbours addiction #BBL06
This wouldn't be happening if Chris Lynn was fighting fit #BBL06

So they just explained what a cherry popper is.
I really need to get a social life.

Buzzfeed have seen the same doco.
https://t.co/SIkhpX2XpB

Turns out I've stumbled across a doco about guys who dress up as dolls. Complete with latex boobs and....the other thing.
I need friends.
Dammit. Trying to stop public crying as this song makes me miss Mr Interstate even more. https://t.co/VzFn2XpLzq
@PetrieLill Chris Lynn would've saved us.
Still proud of ya boys. https://t.co/B2x4fZ5qWh
Til next season! When I'll get my @HeatBBL membership and figure out how to outwit Translink and their lack of buses #TurnUpTheHeat #BBL06
If we brought back Chris Lynn miraculously this wouldn't have happened #BBL06
This is all too nerve-wracking #BBL06
Hope Ben Cutting has been eating his sandwiches #BBL06
Is that my mum in the @HeatBBL floral head piece? #BBL06
Come on, it was either that or I make yet another remark about dropped catches.
Ben Hunt is officially a Dragon come next year, the same team that has done wonders for Widdop and Marshall.
I'm getting emotional over a Commonwealth Bank ad. The one where Steve Smith teaches a girl to score a run. Dammit PMS.
@LadiesWhoLeague Must admit I'm more of a "Rock Lobster" fan.
Time to mute the telly and crank up @abcgrandstand. My grandpa Herb and his BFF Uncle Jim would be proud #AUSvPAK
This commentary team is lacking the following: Party pies Tablecloth shirts "I'm A Celebrity..." small talk #AUSvPAK #BBLHasSpoiledMe
@sdbhjelm @YouTube I can't. She buys us doughnuts.
If someone legit tells me what Andy Lee does at @StarsBBL, that'll be my new job for the @HeatBBL #TurnUpTheHeat #ITooCanBeACricketGroupie
Who dressed Ricky Ponting tonight? The Richie Benaud does the farm ensemble hurts my eyes #BBL06
Wednesday night semi final at The Gabba. This doesn't work out for me. Damn work. Damn bills. Mo money. Mo problems #BBL06
I would talk about the game but I'm more interested in developing my collection of @NathLyon421 GIFs #GOAT #nicegarry #BBL06
@LadyATeamOz @StarsBBL I do like Steven Seagull so I'll be going for the Stars.
Ho hum. At least we're still top of the ladder for another 24 hours or so #BBL06 #TurnUpTheHeat
@PetrieLill Kinda glad I missed out on tickets now.
Safe to say there will be a lot of shitty people at the Pineapple Hotel post match #BBL06
@LadiesWhoLeague And me.
I'm confused guys #BBL06
@tensporttv @LadiesWhoLeague @RenegadesBBL I actually want Ben Cutting's sandwich.
We need more shots of Ben Cutting and his sandwich #BBL06
Make that sundries and that six #BBL06
Sundries. Our only hope #BBL06

RAIN?
I'm five minutes away from the Gabba and it's not raining #BBL06
I didn't want a home final anyway. Next week I'm on late shifts #BBL06
Actually there's a few they can do. The pretzels at the baseball scene, the catch a rock scene or the Dancing Homer one. Oh and the obvious.
Hmmmmm. Now Burns better start smashing it or else the Gabba will be doing a reenactment of a certain Simpsons scene #BBL06
Ok while I'm happy for you all but WHERE WAS THIS FIVE OVERS AGO??? #BBL06 #TurnUpTheHeat
ABOUT BLOODY TIME #BBL06 #TurnUpTheHeat
Actually bring back that bowler with the headband. We were smashing it with that guy #BBL06
Now I miss Chris Lynn again #someonesmashasixdammit #BBL06

Nooooooo!
But stellar effort from Sam Heazlett. Very proud #BBL06 #TurnUpTheHeat
Having said that, I do miss the fourth on line for the King Of QLD, following Wally Lewis, JT and Bernard Fanning #BBL06 #TurnUpTheHeat
Who's Chris Lynn? #bazgoesbang #BBL06 #TurnUpTheHeat
I would blame the bowler's headband but let's face it McCullum is a lean mean six hitting machine #BBL06 #TurnUpTheHeat
So is Survivor a better reality show than I'm A Celebrity Get Me Out Of Here? #BBL06
This is what happens when you ban beer snakes. We start making leaning towers of promotional gear as hats #BBL06
If back flipping on a greyhound ban and implementing lockout laws that have killed industries counts then yes you hâ€¦ https://t.co/EcJkMuTo6n
Nah. It's much more fun quoting scenes from The Room.
Is it too early to bring up state politics with the interstate crush?

And so we say au reviour to #CasinoMike.
Actually it's more like a no way, get fucked, fuck off.
That "7 Years" song is the most morbid excuse for music I have heard in a long time.

35 degrees at 6.30pm.
This is why I hate everything.
Try and beat this @QPSmedia https://t.co/3FnFNFOwCl
When @aishatyler starts mocking Amber Sherlock and her white shirt meltdown. Slay Dr Lewis, slay!
Fro Bro will never reach the celebrity levels of Watermelon Boy. Soz guys #BBL06

I want a fucking man harem.
Thanks @LeeLinChinSBS.
Like to see the @Channel9 commentary team down a bowl of party pies next ODI #BBL06
If you want to walk out of a cinema feeling carefree and aloof, then Passengers isn't for you.
#freenollsie https://t.co/IOWax3ArMc
So if the Aussies win, does that mean pickleback shots in the dressing room? #AUSvPAK
Babar is now heading back to the pavilion to return to his plan of defeating that evil rhinoceros #AUSvPAK
@brisbanebroncos @buckthebronco Boris.
Dammit I'm craving dry Milo. Anyone at the Gabba with Milo? #AUSvPAK
The people sitting behind me have smuggled their own bottle of tomato sauce into the game #AUSvPAK #ketchuporcatsup
Gabba vegetarian options: chips or nothing. Time to take a packed lunch to sporting events.
Remind me why Mitchell Marsh got selected? #AUSvPAK
That's handy to know. https://t.co/4DRGDntWZn
Yo @CricketAus where is the Ussie love? It's because of the dab, isn't it?
Alright if the Broncos can wish members of Violent Soho happy birthday then @storm better send something my way come August 3.
Now we need birthday wishes from Mansfield High School. https://t.co/kVpGmNqWs3
Well I do have a soft spot for the bad boys.... https://t.co/0wXfl8nLQp
@sdbhjelm I don't want to talk about it. Excuse me while I go back to cranking emo music and crying.
Chris Lynn has hit more sixes than I've had boyfriends #BBL06 #TurnUpTheHeat #Lynnsanity
Yo Lynny where was this performance on Tuesday night? #BBL06 #Lynnsanity
Make that two Rabbitohs fans #BBL06
So I'm at The Gabba and I've already spotted a Rabbitohs fan #BBL06
If I hear or see "new year new me" one more time I'm going to go postal.
Already do this. https://t.co/JfsSAs8q75
Take that Channel 9 boys club! https://t.co/tyDwrxMu4e
Does anyone else remember when some newspaper outed Natalie Imbruglia and her "lesbian lover" was actually Daniel Johns?
